GapFillInput.Title: The verb to be
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type the correct word in each gap.
GapFillInput.ContentGapFillInput: Hello. My name is|'sJulie. I'm|amAustralian. I'm from Sydney. Dave, Jennifer and Sally aremy friends. Dave 's|isfrom New York, he's American. Jennifer and Sally areBritish. Jennifer 's|isfrom London and Sally 's|isfrom Manchester. Weare|'restudents.
